mapper.insert: insert into member (m_email, m_pw, m_name, m_nickname, m_phone, m_address, m_state) values (#{m_email}, #{m_pw}, #{m_name}, #{m_nickname}, #{m_phone}, #{m_address}, #{m_state})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE m_email = #{m_email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE m_nickname = #{m_nickname}
